data.name: Bounty of One Demo
data.detailed_description:
- Please remember this is an early demo, many things are still bound to change but we feel like the experience closely teases the feel we wish for for the end result. The early access will contain two other characters, at least 4 other bosses and many other objects to use -

Far, far away, in the most recluded region of the west roam the heroes of the kingdom. Fallen from grace a long time ago, they are now hunted down and struggle to survive. Can they atone for their crimes or will they have to become the monster everyone seems to believe they are?

In this western/fantasy Roguelite/Survival game, play as one of the fallen legends.

Content of this Demo


12 minutes of actions, surviving the waves of bounty hunters. Then a boss you have to eliminate to win this demo.
The full game will have more bosses, more enemies, more objects.

This demo contain :
  • 4 types of enemies
  • 1 sheriff (boss)
  • 30 different objects
  • 10 different upgrades for your character
  • 15 Infamy level to challenge yourself at higher difficulties
  • 10 different meta progression bonus you can unlock while playing the game

Fight hordes of bounty hunters!


They are here for your head, don't let them have it!

Get stronger!


Level up and improve your stats according to your style!

Improve your arsenal!


Choose weapons from the various chests and change the way you play!

Play with friends!


Cooperate to improve as a whole or fight for the best loots!



They can't put shackles on you if you become unstoppable!

data.short_description: Survive to hundreds of bounty hunters and increase your reward until no one is strong enough to claim it! Bounty of One is a casual game with roguelite mechanics set in a fun western/fantasy setting. Choose your upgrades well and overcome your challengers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
